value.title: Age Calculation in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: Power Query has a simple way of calculating the age. However, because DAX is the popular language in many calculations in Power BI, many are not aware of this function in Power Query. In this video, I am going to show you how easy is to calculate Age in Power BI using Power BI. This method is very useful

value.title: Be Careful When Merging on Text Fields in Power BI Using Power Query
value.excerpt: Merging two tables in Power Query is one of the most useful transformations to combine data from different datasets, and also create a flatten data structure. However, if you use a text field for merge, then you might see some unexpected results. Here in this video, I share some important considerations

value.title: Fibonacci Sequence   Understanding the Power Query Recursive Function for Power BI
value.excerpt: Recursive functions in Power Query are not very popular, but sometimes very helpful when in need. In this post, I'll explain what a recursive function is, how it works, and explain it through a famous recursive example of Fibonacci Sequence. value.title: Unpivot in Power BI and Power Query Transforming Budget Data from Columns to Rows
value.excerpt: Turning columns to rows or rows to columns is easy with Power Query and Power BI. There are many situations that you get a name, value data source, and wants to convert that into columns with values underneath. On the other hand, many times you get multiple columns and want to change it to name, value
